lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Besides the extra-territorial effect, there is the potential that Conadian producers and consumers may end up subsidizing the cost of transportation services originally incurred on behalf of U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Better times for the hard hit natural gas industry remains two to three years away as a seemingly intractable supply bubble continues to depress sales and prices, industry officials said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "We see a tough, tough short-term market, both as to price and volume," said Michael Phelps, vice president of <Westcoast Transmission Co Ltd>, a major Canadian natural gas carrier.
